MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG2 postcode area of Dumfries. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:45pm due to a fault on the underground cable network outside 4 Westpark Cottages and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the final repairs are being completed and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:47 PM on Friday, 29 January 2021.
